DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Male female patient 18 year old Recipients first kidney transplant decease living relate donor Exclusion criterion Need medication prohibit study Patients heart disease ( family history ) Patients donor HIV , Hepatitis B ( HBsAg ) Hepatitis C ( HCV ) positive Patients high immunological risk Patients history cancer Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
